Yes! Please contact us after March the 6th. Everything is hectic right now with the bags and everything 💜💕

Yes, I saw you have quite a great run ahead of you and I am wishing you all good luck on the road! Your agents are booking you on some really incredible festivals. We also have an artist playing BottleRock & Palm Tree Fest as well! Would it be best for you all if we wait until you are back from touring for an intro call? Otherwise we could chat on non-show days or whenever you are feeling! Happy to be as flexible as possible to find a time that would work best for you all!

Awesome! What do you have in mind? We'll be touring until March the 1st!

Les acabo de enviar un correo! Como les digo, creemos que hay una buena oportunidad para co-crear. Si quieren podemos cuadrar una llamada para hablar mejor. Cualquier duda estoy pendiente. Muchas gracias!

Me da la impresión que nos van a dar una tarifa irrisoria y pues el fep es de los festivales que peor pagan, así que lo más probable es que rompa nuestro umbral de sostenibilidad, sin embargo nos gustaría expandir en nuestra escenografía para shows grandes y nos gustaría al menos ver que propuestas pueden tener. 

Si gustan envíenos un correo a balthvsmusic@gmail.com

Hello BALTHVS,

I hope the entire BALTHVS team is doing great!

I’m Andrés Moreno, founder and Creative Director of BRL Media. https://brlmedia.net/visuals/

We love working with bands and artists to create visual universes tailored to their live shows.
We’ve been involved in producing tour visuals for Feid, Andrés Cepeda, Alci Acosta, Piso 21, among others!

Do you currently work with external studios or agencies for your show visuals?

We know you’ll be performing at FEP 2025, and I’d love to connect and explore what we can create together!
Mixto sent an attachment.
Reaccionó 💚 a tu mensaje
Thanks for being there! We had a blast. You guys were amazing ❤️
You guys were absolutely INCREDIBLE! My friend who gave you the art piece introduced me to your music today and you all blew my mind. Thank you. 👏🏻💕✨
Hey Ritch, thanks for following us ✨Have you had the chance to listen to the music?
